title: Part List
description: A list of products required to manufacture parts, including calculated quantities and pricing information

specs.description: Summary of specs to identify this part list entry. Like SLS 33x195x6000 or OSB3-12-1220x2440

part_names.description: List of part names included in this part list entry

pieces.description: Number of pieces (aggregated by part/product id with special algorithm)

price_per_quantity.description: Price per quantity unit (e.g. product, pieces, total_quantity)

price.description: Total price for the required quantity

waste.description: Waste quantity (difference between ordered and part quantity)
